Regulation Name(s): Newborn screening test for severe combined immunodeficiency disorder (SCID)
Specimen Type(s): Blood specimen dried on filter paper
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Fluorescent-based nucleic acid amplification and detection
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PerkinElmer Eonis SCID-SMA kit for semi-quantitative multiplex real-time PCR screening of newborns for SCID and XLA using TREC and KREC markers
Indications for Use Summary: Semi-quantitative determination of TREC for screening newborns for Severe Combined Immunodeficiency (SCID) and KREC for screening newborns for X-linked agammaglobulinemia (XLA) from DNA extracted from dried blood spots, for use on the QuantStudio Dx Real-Time PCR instrument; not intended for diagnosis or for other SCID-like syndromes.
